p: (1R,2S)-1-Ethyl 1-(4-methylbenzyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylate (14). Flash chromatography on silica gel using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:99) afforded the product as yellow oil in 65% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.30 (dddd, J = 13.4, 11.6, 7.5, 3.7 Hz, 5H), 7.03 (s, J = 7.9 Hz, 4H), 4.21 − 4.08 (m, 2H), 3.22 − 3.06 (m, 1H), 2.86 − 2.77 (m, 1H), 2.29 (s, 3H), 1.91 − 1.83 (m, 2H), 1.40 (dd, J = 7.2, 5.0 Hz, 1H), 1.21 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
